name: NeoGen Wireless Headphones
description: Experience pure sound with our latest noise-canceling technology. 40-hour battery life and plush ear cushions for all-day comfort.

name: Analog Mechanical Keyboard
description: Tactile switches meet modern aesthetics. Fully programmable keys with RGB backlighting and an aluminum chassis.

name: Lumina Smart Watch
description: Track your health, messages, and life with the Lumina. Features an always-on Retina display and water resistance up to 50m.

name: Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: Brighten your workspace with adjustable color temperature and brightness. Sleek design fits any modern setup.

name: ErgoChair Pro
description: Designed for 24/7 comfort. Adjustable lumbar support, headrest, and armrests to keep your posture perfect.

name: Ceramic Coffee Set
description: Handcrafted ceramic set including a pour-over dripper and two mugs. Perfect for the morning ritual.
